sense.def:
Osebo ali stvar, ki je
popular
, ima rado veliko ljudi.

seg.quote: He has always been popular among Conservatives.
Swimming is very popular with all ages.

sense.def:
Zamisli ali stališča, ki so
popular
, sprejema ali podpira večina ljudi.

seg.quote: Contrary to popular belief, science does not offer us certainties.

sense.def:
Časopisi in televizijske oddaje, ki so
popular
, so namenjene navadnim ljudem in ne strokovnjakom za posamezna področja.

seg.quote: The popular press is obsessed with the Royal Family.
